channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeanine Pirro sworn in as interim US attorney, pledging 'no more mercy for criminals'
item.description: Jeanine Pirro appeared alongside President Donald Trump at the White House to be sworn in as U.S. attorney for the District of Columbia on Wednesday.

item.title: 'It's Hopeless': Crestfallen CBS Hack Lesley Stahl Doesn't 'See a Path Out' of Trump's America

item.title: White House Chides AOC After New Call to Scrap ICE
item.description: The White House fired back at Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., who again called for the abolishment of Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

item.title: New: DC Shooter's Sick and Evil Manifesto, Chat Logs Revealed

item.title: Call It 'Waah-Po' - Jonathan Capehart Quits Editorial Board at the Paper in Hilarious Snit Fit
AOC fundraises on trying to abolish ICE amid Trump's crackdown on illegal immigration
item.description: The NRCC criticized Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez for fundraising on seeking to abolish ICE.
